original_text: But Joab and Abishai pursued Abner. And as the sun was going down they came to the hill of Ammah, which lies before Giah on the way to the wilderness of Gibeon.
korean_text: 요압과 아비새가 아브넬의 뒤를 쫓아 기브온 거친 땅의 길 가 기아 맞은쪽 암마 산에 이를 때에 해가 졌고

sentences.original_text: But Joab and Abishai pursued Abner.
And as the sun was going down
they came to the hill of Ammah,
on the way to the wilderness of Gibeon.
